Package com.group13.hffs.gui

Interface Summary
ImageResponseDialog.NoticeDialogListener This interface acts like a listener to give feedback to its parent activity
 

Class Summary
AccountActivity This activity allows a user to change the information for their account
BrowseItemActivity This activity allows users to browse Items, they can select a specific items to view more details
BuildConfig  
CustomGridViewAdapter Helper for browse items to display the list of items
ExpandableListAdapter This class provides the adapter to construct the expandable list view for offers
ImageResponseDialog This class provides a dialog for the upload picture button, deciding if the picture is selected from gallery or taken directly from camera
ItemPage This activity contains all info for an item selected from item list, allows user to make an offer for the item
LogInActivity This Activity allows a user to log on well.
MainMenuActivity This activity displays the main menu with the post item, browse items, and browse offers buttons
MakeOfferDialog This class represents a dialog that pops up when user wants to make an offer
OfferActivity This activity allows a user to view an individual offer
PostItemActivity This is the activity that allows a user to post an item to the application
R  
R.array  
R.attr  
R.dimen  
R.drawable  
R.id  
R.layout  
R.string  
R.style  
RecoverPasswordActivity This activity sends an email containing corresponding passwords to users who pressed recover password button
SignUpActivity This activity allows a user to sign up for the application
StartActivity This activity is the start activity for the application, you can log in or sign up
ViewItemByTypeDialog This class represents the dialog that pops up so the user can select which item type they want to browse by
ViewOffersActivity This activity gets and display offers for a user
